TopicTitle: How to add button to right click part menu

Articles.Content: Could anyone can help me? I made part module, it added some actions and I'd like to link one of them to button under right click menu.

TaranisElsu has made a good couple of [thread=56053]example plugins[/thread] available. Among them is a good example right click menus (KSPevents). KSPevents are very good when you want to call classes from the right-click menu.

If you need to more closely control values (anything from a bool, float to a vector2), KSPfields can now also be accessed from the right-click menu if you tag them correctly.
Yes, of course I forgot about KSPevents... Thanks
